gamedatas.name: Snake Runner
gamedatas.guide: The Snake game is a charming and simple challenge to play during downtime. To play Snake, use the arrow keys to move the snake left, right, up, or down towards the apples. As you eat apples, the snake will get longer and more difficult to avoid.Playing the Snake game requires a lot of concentration. So, rushing can leave you prone to mistakes. Take your time and think through each move. Game ends if head touch its own body part

gamedatas.name: Tic Tac Toe
gamedatas.guide: In a 3-by-3 grid game, the player who is playing 'X' always goes first. Players alternate placing Xs and Os on the board until either player has three in a row, horizontally, vertically, or diagonally or until all squares on the grid are filled. If a player is able to draw three Xs or three Os in a row, then that player wins. If all squares are filled and neither player has made a complete row of Xs or Os, then the game is a draw.

gamedatas.name: Find the Pair
gamedatas.guide: The objective of the Pair Memory Game is to match all the pairs of cards with identical images by flipping them over two at a time. The game is designed to test and improve your memory skills, concentration, and cognitive abilities. The player must remember the location of each card in order to match the pairs . The ultimate goal of the game is to complete it in the shortest time possible with the least number of moves.

gamedatas.name: Sudoku
gamedatas.guide: The objective of the game is to populate each field in the puzzle with a number ranging from 1 to 9. This has to be done in such a way that each number appears only once per row, once per column and once per zone. Because all these elements consist of 9 fields, all the numbers between 1 and 9 should be used (once) in each element. To palay use track pad to select the numbers from bottom row and click the number where u think is to be filled and if the number u picked is incorrect ,the number of errors u made will be displayed on top of the board
